# Preferred Libraries
- requests>=2.32.3: HTTP requests
- beautifulsoup4>=4.12.3: HTML parsing
- lxml>=5.3.0: XML/HTML parser
- sqlite3: Database operations (standard library)
- argparse: CLI argument parsing (standard library)
- logging: Logging (standard library)
- pytest>=8.3.3: Testing framework
- pytest-cov>=5.0.0: Coverage reporting
- pytest-mock>=3.14.0: Mocking utilities
- black>=24.10.0: Code formatting
- isort>=5.13.2: Import sorting
- mypy>=1.13.0: Type checking
- flake8>=7.1.0: Linting
- pre-commit>=4.0.1: Git hooks

# Requirements File
- Maintain a `requirements.txt` file listing all dependencies with exact versions
- Maintain a `pyproject.toml` file for development dependencies
